page.title: 02AGRICULTURE
page.content: ARABLE FARMING There are several farms in the block given over to arable farming. The main crops are wheat,root vegetables,oil_seed rape and soft fruit.There are no major dairy farms in the block. BIRCH HOLT An interesting house surrounded by arable fields.It was built in the 17th century and is set in 7 acres.It is owned by the Burkett family.They have 2 ewes,3 lambs, 15 steers and a baby goat. The boundaries of Birch, Layer and Messing meet in one room so one person can be in three places at once!
